verbs.description: Donald Trump and Sarah Huckabee Sanders [V: have] been lying through their teeth about the administration ’s policy of ripping children away from their parents if they cross the border . PolitiFact calls the claim false , but it ’s more than that . It ’s an outright lie and an incoherent argument as well , especially when they blame it on the …
